mapper.select: SELECT if(#{order2} = 'desc', row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ${order1} asc), row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ${order1} desc)) as row_num , w.idx , w.title , w.content , w.document_type , DATE_FORMAT(w.insert_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as insert_dt , w.insert_user , w.cust_cd , ifnull(c.cust_nm, '') as cust_nm , DATE_FORMAT(w.receipt_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as receipt_dt , DATE_FORMAT(w.due_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as due_dt , if(compl_yn = 'Y', null, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,NOW(), w.due_dt)) AS int_Dday , if(compl_yn = 'Y', null, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,NOW(), w.due_dt)) AS str_Dday , DATE_FORMAT(w.compl_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as compl_dt , compl_yn FROM WorkLog w LEFT OUTER JOIN Customer c ON w.cust_cd = c.cust_cd WHERE w.deleted_yn = 'N' AND w.insert_user = #{userId} AND w.compl_yn like concat('%', #{complYn}, '%') AND w.document_type like concat('%', #{documentType}, '%') AND w.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') AND w.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%') AND COALESCE(c.cust_nm, '') like concat('%', #{custNm}, '%') AND w.${orderby1} >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND w.${orderby1} <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY row_num desc

SELECT w.idx , w.title , w.content , w.document_type , w.insert_dt , w.insert_user , w.cust_cd , c.cust_nm , w.receipt_dt , due_dt , compl_dt FROM WorkLog w LEFT OUTER JOIN Customer c ON w.cust_cd = c.cust_cd WHERE w.idx = ${idx} AND w.insert_user = #{userId}
